div.p: Longhorn PHP returns for 2025! Held in Austin, TX, the conference will run from October 23-25, with a tutorial day on Thursday, followed by two main conference days. We are excited to bring PHP developers from all backgrounds together again for three days of fun and education. We are currently accepting talk and tutorial submissions. While the CFP is open, we also have our Blind Bird tickets available for sale.
Follow us on Mastodon signup for emails at longhornphp.com to get notified with important conference updates.
